Vitamin C Rich Hydration cream is deeply hydrating, visibly brightens dull skin, fights the signs of dehydration and damage, and provides advanced antioxidant support. Formulated with THD Ascorbate, a powerful, jar-stable, and highly targeted Vitamin C derivative that prevents and repairs the visible signs of premature skin aging.
src: ./images/products/CEO Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Charcoal Smoothie Body Scrub
info: his skin-polishing body scrub targets bumpy, textured, flaky skin (including keratosis pilaris or “chicken skin” on the arms and thighs with a dual-action exfoliation system. Salicylic acid and lactic acid work to clarify and smooth bumps and rough patches, while natural exfoliating powders massage away dull dead skin cells. Activated charcoal works with manuka to pull impurities up and out, for a balanced, deep clean. Coconut water and avocado oil nourish and rehydrate, leaving your whole body instantly smoother, softer, and nurtured.
src: ./images/products/Charcoal Smoothie Body Scrub by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Clean Rinse Scalp Serum
info: An AHA/BHA-infused, rinse-off serum to clarify the scalp of product buildup, excess oil, dead skin, and pollution for a cleaner, healthier-looking scalp and refreshed hair.
src: ./images/products/Clean Rinse Scalp Serum by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Good Genes Glycolic Acid Treatment
info: Containing clean, ultra-pure, formaldehyde-free glycolic acid, to revitalize the appearance of dull, congested, and sun damaged skin, without compromising on what matters to you most: safety, quality, and fast results. Good Genes Glycolic penetrates the surface of the skin with tiny glycolic acid molecules, sinking deeper into the skin than other forms of AHA, to break apart pore-clogging debris and repair the look of sun-damaged, congested, wrinkled, or dull skin. With just one use, instant radiance and skin clarity are visibly boosted. Balanced with fermented prickly pear extract, perfect for sensitive skin, to soothe and calm the complexion, along with skin-purifying lemongrass extract.
src: ./images/products/Good Genes Glycolic Acid Treatment by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizing Cream
info: Ceramide-enriched moisturizer replenishes the skin with lasting hydration and strengthens the skin’s natural moisture barrier against environmental stressors responsible for premature aging. Skin stays smooth, balanced and ageless-looking throughout the day. Rich but lightweight, this dual action moisturizer uses beetroot and coconut extract to pull hydration into the skin, while ceramides, vitamin F, and pomegranate sterols strengthen the skin's natural moisture barrier, sealing in moisture. Together, skin is glowing, baby-smooth, and deeply hydrated. Best for Normal to Dry Skin.
src: ./images/products/ICE Ceramide Moisturizing Cream by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Juno Antioxidant + Superfood Face Oil
info: An obsession-worthy face oil, Juno gives an instant glow to dehydrated skin by restoring and rehydrating the skin’s natural moisture barrier with a blend of organic, cold-pressed, antioxidant-rich, superfood seed oils. Freshly extracted in small quantities, cold-pressed blackberry, blueberry, cranberry, raspberry, wild carrot, black cumin, grape, and broccoli seed oils retain their delicate, rich nutrients. Healthy-looking radiance is immediately restored, as the skin is fortified with critical antioxidants, vitamins, essential amino acids, Omegas 3-6-9, and skin soothing botanicals.
src: ./images/products/Juno Antioxidant + Superfood Face Oil by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Luna Sleeping Night Oil
info: A next-generation retinol oil that boosts the look and feel of skin plumpness, while improving the appearance of wrinkles, redness, and pores for visibly younger-looking skin. Luna works throughout the night to deliver visibly youthful, luminous, even-toned skin in the morning. Trans-retinoic acid ester complex reduces the appearance of pores and wrinkles, while visibly improving the signs of premature aging: fine lines, uneven texture, age spots, dryness, and dullness. Balanced with blue tansy and German chamomile essential oils, both rich in soothing, blue azulene, visible redness and the signs of sensitivity are neutralized, for a calm, even-toned complexion.
important: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT FOR USE DURING PREGNANCY.
src: ./images/products/Luna Sleeping Night Oil by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Saturn Sulfur Spot Treatment
info: A medicated spot treatment mask that clears up acne while preventing new blemishes from forming. Formulated with 10% sulfur, this acne-fighting spot treatment mask clears up blemishes and targets causes that lead to future breakouts. High-strength sulfur dries excess (pore-clogging) sebum and removes dead skin cells. Promoting clearer-looking skin, 4% niacinamide helps boost skin’s radiance. Zinc PCA and bentonite help to draw out impurities, reduce excess oil, and soothe the look of surface redness. Highly potent tea tree oil, standardized for high levels of terpinen-4-ol, partnered with manuka oil, purifies the skin. Complexion looks and feels smoother and clearer with each use.
src: ./images/products/Saturn Sulfur Spot Treatment by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: Tidal Brightening Enzyme Water Cream
info: A lightweight, oil-free gel-cream for instantly glowing, dewy skin. Two forms of advanced hyaluronic acid infuse water into the skin. Gently refining papaya enzymes smooth the look of textured or dehydrated skin, for a baby-soft complexion. Alpha-arbutin brightens the appearance of discolorations for clear radiance.
src: ./images/products/Tidal Brightening Enzyme Water Cream by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: U.F.O. Ultra-Clarifying Face Oil
info: With 1.5 percent salicylic acid, this fast-acting, quick-drying, medicated oil clears acne and blackhead-causing buildup and debris from congested pores for smoother, blemish-free skin. Tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil support clear skin, while hexylresorcinol and licorice naturally brighten the appearance of old acne discolorations for a more even-toned complexion. Counterbalancing the potentially drying effects of salicylic acid, milk thistle, and cucumber seed oil nourish the skin and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles, without leaving a greasy residue. Chamomile and neroli soothe stressed, blemish-prone skin. With salicylic acid, tea tree oil, black cumin seed oil, this acne treatment clears blackheads from your nose, chin, and forehead, while preventing and treating acne. Great for scalp and back acne too!
src: ./images/products/U.F.O. Ultra-Clarifying Face Oil by Sunday Riley.jpg

name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Borage Seed Oil
info: This formulation contains 100% pure Borage Seed Oil that is sustainably-sourced, organic and cold-pressed This nourishing oil helps soothe dry skin with a high concentration of gamma-linolenic acid (GLA), an important essential fatty acid, as well as linoleic, oleic, stearic and palmitic acids. Borage Seed Oil offers a calming effect, helps maintain healthy skin and is suited particularly well for the dry and/or irritated skin conditions
how: Apply a few drops daily or as needed to entire face ideally after water-based treatments. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: Patch tests are an easy way to help predict if you may experience a negative initial reaction to a new product. It is recommended to perform a patch test before incorporating any new product into your regimen.

name: 100% Organic Virgin Chia Seed Oil
info: This formulation contains 100% pure Chia Seed Oil that is sustainably-sourced, organic, virgin and cold-pressed. This hydrating skin oil contains an exceptionally-high concentration of alpha-linolenic acid, an important essential fatty acid, and linoleic, oleic, stearic as well as palmitic acids, together with multiple vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. This oil also adds softness, sheen and strength to hair.
how: Hair Application—Work through damp, clean hair daily or as needed. Skin Application—Apply a few drops daily or as needed to entire face ideally after water-based treatments. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin.
important: Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
info: Alpha hydroxy acids (AHA) exfoliate the skin's topmost surface for a brighter and more even appearance. Beta hydroxy acids (BHA) also exfoliate the skin with an extended function to help clear pore congestion. This combined 30% AHA and 2% BHA solution offers deeper exfoliation to help fight visible blemishes and for improved skin radiance. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture and reduces the look of fine lines with continued use. This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative to help reduce irritation associated with acid use. This derivative is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally and this colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time. This formula is further supported with a crosspolymer form of hyaluronic acid for comfort, Vitamin B5 to assist healing and black carrot as an antioxidant. Note: This formula contains a very high concentration of free acids. We recommend use only if you are an experienced user of acid exfoliation and your skin is not sensitive.
how: Clean face and wait for skin to dry. Do not use on wet skin. Apply evenly across face and neck using fingertips, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for no more than 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes both during application and rinse off. This low-viscosity solution is intended to be used as a masque. Do not leave on for longer than 10 minutes. It is not recommended to use more than twice per week. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin.
important: Contraindications: This formula should not be used on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Note: While exfoliating acids can result in quick visible benefits, we  suggest indirect forms of skin exfoliation in favour of direct forms such as this formula due to potential inflammation and sensitivity associated with acids. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) and a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

name: 100% Organic Virgin Sea-Buckthorn Fruit Oil
info: This formulation contains 100% pure Sea-Buckthorn Fruit oil that is sustainably-sourced, organic, unrefined and virgin in origin. This exceptional Sea-Buckthorn Fruit oil is derived from the pulp of the Sea-Buckthorn berry. This oil contains a high concentration of rare palmitoleic acid (Omega 7) to protect the skin from damage due to dryness. It also offers other fatty acids like palmitic acid, stearic acid, oleic acid, linolenic acid and linoleic acid as well as antioxidants like tocopherol (Vitamin E), carotenoids and lycopene that all help to protect the skin from free radical damage and to maintain the skin’s normal barrier function.
how: Mix a few drops with other treatments in the palm of your hand and apply to the face, ideally at bedtime after application of water-based treatments. Wash hands after application and avoid product contact with fabric as it may stain. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician.
important: Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Alpha Arbutin 2% + HA
info: Alpha Arbutin reduces the look of age spots and can help improve skin tone. It's used at a high 2% concentration versus a standard concentration of 1% and supported with a next-generation form of Hyaluronic Acid for enhanced delivery. Alpha Arbutin is much stronger in effect than Arbutin or Beta Arbutin.
important: Alpha Arbutin is extremely sensitive to degradation in the presence of water if the pH of the formulation is not ideal. The pH of this formula is approximately 4.9 which is shown to be the most suitable pH to minimize degradation of Alpha Arbutin.

name: Argireline Solution 10%
info: ARGIRELINE™ is a trademark owned by Barcelona-based Lipotec S.A.U. It is a proprietary solution of Acetyl Hexapeptide-8. Controlled studies have shown that ARGIRELINE™ improves the appearance of facial areas prone to developing dynamic folds, including around the eyes and in the forehead area. Note: Studies have shown that the water content of formulations does impact the utility level of topical ARGIRELINE™ and specifically that higher water content results in better utility. This formulation is water-based and avoids oils, esters and silicones.
how: Apply a few drops on the forehead and around the eyes twice daily before heavier treatments. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: It is best to not use Peptides in the same routine as the following products: Direct acids, LAA (L-Ascorbic Acid) and ELAA (Ethylated Ascorbic Acid). In addition, we would recommend avoiding the use of products containing copper peptides in the same routine as strong antioxidants as well as direct acids/LAA/ELAA.

name: Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20%
info: Vitamin C is an effective antioxidant, brightens the skin tone and reduces signs of aging. In its pure form, Vitamin C is unstable in water. Ascorbyl Glucoside is a water-soluble derivative of Vitamin C. It is much more stable in water but it is less potent than direct L-Ascorbic Acid. Being more compatible with water allows for a very pleasant serum texture. It is considered a gold standard of Vitamin C derivatives due to its high stability and comfortable use, but it's impossible to achieve extremely high L-Ascorbic Acid potency with this solution. Aside from the general benefits of pure Vitamin C, Ascorbyl Glucoside has been shown to offer specific skin brightening benefits.
how: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM.
important: If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Ethylated Ascorbic Acid 15% Solution
info: An exceptionally-stable solution of 15% Ethylated Ascorbic Acid, this water-free formula offers a direct-acting approach to achieving a radiant, healthy-looking skin tone. Unlike other Vitamin C derivatives, this ethylated form acts directly like Vitamin C, is closer in molecular weight to actual Vitamin C which allows for faster visible results, and offers a much better stability profile than any known direct-acting form of Vitamin C.
how: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: Since this formulation is a water-free solution, it may feel slightly 'oily' for a few seconds after application, despite the absence of all oils.

name: Granactive Retinoid 2% in Squalane
info: This water-free solution contains a 2% concentration of an advanced retinoid active complex called Granactive Retinoid™ that has been shown to offer better results against multiple signs of aging than retinol without any of the irritation and drawbacks common with retinol. Granactive Retinoid™, an active technology from Grant Industries, is a solubilized system of Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate, a highly-advanced form of retinoid which is, in fact, a non-prescription ester of all-trans direct retinoic acid that offers a multi-fold better effect against signs of aging than retinol, retinyl palmitate and nearly all other forms of non-prescription retinoid. This product uses next-generation retinoid active technologies which have been shown to achieve better reduction in signs of aging than retinol without irritation. These technologies cannot be compared directly with retinol itself in terms of concentration because they include a different retinoid molecule, in a similar way that Retinol cannot be compared with Retinoic Acid in terms of concentration.
important: Caution: Retinoids can make the skin more sensitive to UV radiation. Sun protection is particularly important when using retinoids. This product must not be used in conjunction with other retinoids including retinol or retinoic acid. This product is not a treatment for acne. Acne-prone skin may experience a temporary increase in acne during the first few weeks of using any form of retinoid including those used in this formulation. Note: When pregnant or breastfeeding, it is recommended to avoid any skincare products containing retinoids such as formulations with Granactive Retinoid™ or Retinol.

name: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA
info: Mandelic Acid 10% + HA offers superficial dermal peeling that is gentler than other alpha hydroxy acids. The molecular weight of mandelic acid is 152.1 daltons which is larger than other alpha hydroxy acids (glycolic acid is 76.0 daltons, for example). This larger size allows mandelic acid to penetrate the skin more slowly which in turn makes it very gentle and suitable for all skin types. You don't need a concentration of more than 10%, because then you would simply be achieving an indirect peeling strength that is more easily offered through lower percentages of glycolic acid. Note: While exfoliating acids can result in quick visible benefits, we  suggest the use of indirect forms of skin exfoliation in favour of direct forms such as this formula due to potential inflammation and sensitivity associated with acids. Please refer to NIOD's Non-Acid Acid Precursor for such a suggested formula.
how: Apply once per day, ideally in the PM. Can be diluted with other treatments to reduce strength until skin develops tolerance. Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Avoid contact with eyes. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
important: Contraindications: This formula should not be used on sensitive, peeling, or compromised skin. Please refer to additional sun protection note and other warnings in provided Directions. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

name: Pycnogenol 5%
info: Pycnogenol® is a natural plant extract derived from the pine bark of French maritime pine trees. It contains procyanidins, bioflavonoids and organic acids that work in synergy to rejuvenate the skin, with the aim of enhancing skin hydration and elasticity. With the ability to selectively bind to collagen and elastin, Pycnogenol® protects these proteins from degradation, helping to nourish the skin from the inside out. Being a unique and powerful antioxidant, Pycnogenol® scavenges for free radicals before they cause damage by oxidative stress. It can also recycle oxidized Vitamin C to restore its activity. The Ordinary Pycnogenol® 5% is free of artificial colours. The formula’s deep red colour is due to the high procyanidin content in Pycnogenol®.
how: Apply alone or after water-based serums, before oils or heavier creams. Alternatively, mix with other treatments to enhance their antioxidant capacity significantly. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: After application, please wash hands and avoid product contact with light coloured fabric as it may stain.

name: Angel Wash Recovery
info: This delicate recovery shampoo is for fine, dry or broken, coloured hair. It is designed to cleanse without stripping your hair or affecting your colour. The hydrolysed oat protein adds volume and body without weighing hair down, whilst the green tea leaf extract aids moisture retention and increases elasticity. Full of antioxidant properties the ANGEL.WASH shampoo protects your hair against all the stresses it may encounter in daily life. Give over processed hair a break with offering nourishment with the ANGEL.WASH and ANGEL.RINSE.
how: Apply to wet hair and massage into hair and scalp. Rinse and repeat if needed. Follow with Kevin Murphy ANGEL.RINSE

name: Angel Rinse
info: This delicate recovery conditioner is for fine, dry or broken coloured hair. The hydrolysed oat protein adds volume and body without weighing hair down, whilst mango and cocoa butter gently repairs damaged hair without adding heavy waxes or oils, keeping your hair soft and protected. Angelica root conditions and hydrates your hair and scalp. Full of antioxidants ANGEL.RINSE protects your hair against all the stresses it may encounter in daily life. Offer your hair nourishment with the ANGEL.WASH and ANGEL.RINSE.
how: Apply to wet hair after using Kevin Murphy ANGEL.WASH. Distribute through the lengths and ends. Rinse thoroughly

name: Angel Masque
info: An ultra repairing treatment mask designed to restore, condition and thicken fine, dry and coloured hair. With a strengthening blend of quinoa proteins, tri-peptides, lotus flower and bamboo extracts to help to re-hydrate, promote hair growth and reduce damage to reveal healthier, shinier hair.
how: For best results use after shampooing with Kevin Murphy ANGEL.WASH (available on our platform). Massage into scalp and hair. Leave on for 2-10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. Ideal for using once a week

name: Balancing Wash
info: A daily strengthening shampoo to help revitalise and cleanse. Formulated with a blend of botanicals that are rich in antioxidants, it effectively helps to balance sebum, add volume, protect colour and invigorate making it perfect for both normal and oily hair types. It also helps to protect against damage caused by heat and over styling.
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage and then rinse thoroughly

name: Blonde.Angel.Wash
info: This lavender infused colour enhancing shampoo for blonde hair has been developed with optical brighteners to rescue dulled colour and restore shine. This is perfect for blonde or grey hair. This shampoo contains a number of key natural ingredients, including murumuru butter to promote glossy hair, shea butter to maintain and restore your hair's natural elasticity, mango seed butter, lavender flower, jojoba seed oil, keratin amino acids and sunflower seed oil. It is also sulphate and paraben free.
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp and hair. Rinse and repeat. For best results, follow with Kevin Murphy BLONDE.ANGEL (available on our platform)

name: Blonde.Angel
info: Colour enhancing treatment conditioner for blonde hair. Designed to enhance, refresh and repair brassy and yellow tones in blonde hair, this transforming treatment is the ideal product for all your blonde hair needs. Formulated with vitamins, antioxidants, and omega fatty acids, it not only enhances colour, but also de-frizzes, softens, tames and reduces breakage. Use in replace of your usual conditioner to reveal, brighter more radiant blonde tones.
how: Apply to clean, wet hair, ideally after using Kevin Murphy BLONDE.ANGEL.WASH (available on our platform). Distribute through the lengths and ends. Leave for 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly
important: Contains nut oil.

name: Cool Angel Treatment
info: Grey is the new blonde with COOL.ANGEL. Perfect for platinums, silvers, crystal blondes, ash blondes, ash brunettes and of course natural greys. Containing pigments that have been selected to enhance existing ash tones, adding a slate hue while neutralising unwanted red and orange. The result is an added cool edge with high shine for longer lasting colour without building up on the hair. COOL.ANGEL doesn't leave a residue to can be used as frequently as desired.
how: Use in place of a conditioner. Shampoo as normal and apply to wet hair. Distribute from roots to ends. Leave on for 3-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly

name: Crystal Angel Hair Treatment
info: Enhance your existing colour with this illuminating treatment that adds a protective top coat with a unique lip gloss-like shine. Designed to moisturise, enhance, restore shine, and refresh coloured or un-coloured hair for tresses gleaming with health. Containing pigments that have been selected to enhance existing tones while neutralising unwanted ones, providing longer lasting colour without building up on the hair.
how: Shampoo as usual, and apply to wet hair. Distribute from roots to ends. Leave on for 3-5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly, and style as normal

name: Full Again Lotion
info: Ideal for fine, coloured and damaged hair, this lightweight lotion contains tiny water-soluble rayon fibers, which help make the hair feel fuller, smoother and stronger. It also contains essential oils of elemi, amyris and sandalwood, which help rejuvenate and moisturise, and beeswax which seals in moisture and protects the hair from heat damage.
how: Apply to damp hair. Distribute through mid-lengths and ends . Blow dry the hair. For best results, use with a root volumiser

name: Hydrate Me Rinse
info: HYDRATE.ME.RINSE is a super smoothing and hydrating conditioner for normal to dry hair. It is for hair that just cannot be repaired or hair that is naturally dry or hair that lives in a very dry climate. Think of it as a hair concealer as it disguises the damage. It will nourish dry hair and make split ends unrecognizable. It contains micro algae for radiance and kakadu plum to maintain level of collagen and elastin, essential for healthy lustrous hair. Instant hydrating and de-tangling properties from evening primrose oil infuse the hair with moisture and gloss. The formulation is still packed with antioxidants as this gives the hair a healthy glow and stops the hair from losing any more moisture. New technology has allowed Kevin Murphy to use the same ingredients found in high end skincare that diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, they applied this to hair and found that it gave hair a glossy shield than hid any signs of damage and resulted in a smoother cuticle.
how: Apply to wet hair after shampooing with Kevin Murphy HYDRATE.ME.WASH (available on our platform). Distribute through the lengths and ends. Leave on for 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly

name: Hydrate Me Wash
info: HYDRATE-ME.WASH is a super smoothing and hydrating shampoo for normal to dry hair. It is for hair that just cannot be repaired, for hair that is naturally dry, or for hair that lives in a very dry climate. Think of it as a hair concealer as it disguises the damage. It will nourish dry hair and make split ends unrecognizable. This formulation is still packed with antioxidants as this gives the hair a healthy glow and stops the hair from losing any more moisture. New technology has allowed Kevin Murphy to use the same ingredients found in high end skincare that diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. They applied this to hair and found that it gave hair a glossy shield than hid any signs of damage and resulted in a smoother cuticle.
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage into the hair. Rinse and repeat. Follow with Kevin Murphy HYDRATE.ME.RINSE (available on our platform)

name: Hair Resort
info: This finishing product will give you sexy summer hair all year round. The holding power of HAIR.RESORT is strong and weightless. Use as a curl enhancer to add body and texture to all hair types. Scrunch into hair that has already been dried for a full bodied look.
how: Apply to damp or dry hair. Scrunch into the hair to distribute product. Leave in, or continue to style as usual

name: Smooth Again Wash
info: A smoothing and cleansing shampoo that refines and softens thick and unruly hair. Monoi oil and murumuru seed butter work to control frizz by making hair shinier and stronger, whilst fatty acids help to even out the moisture levels in the hair. Ideal for unmanageable hair, with consistent use SMOOTH.AGAIN WASH nourishes, de-frizzes and calms to reveal healthier, softer hair.
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp, roots, lengths and ends. Rinse and repeat. For best results, follow with Kevin Murphy SMOOTH.AGAIN.RINSE
important: Contains nut oil.

name: Killer Curls Creme
info: A leave-in defining cream designed to make styling coarse, curly or frizzy hair easy. With a quick absorbing formulation that is rich in antioxidants, it helps to smooth, re-hydrate, define and add weightless body and texture to reveal fuller, tighter and more voluminous hair. Offer heat protection, this smoothing an defining cream helps to reduce friction, so styling curly hair is easier, and effortless.
how: Apply to wet, or towel dried hair. Distribute by scrunching hair to activate curls. Style as usual

name: Leave In Repair Treatment
info: A nourishing, restorative leave-in treatment that works to repair damaged hair by adding strength and reducing breakage. Enriched with jojoba seed oil that adds moisture and smooths the hair, hydrolysed green pea protein to repair and strengthen and bamboo leaf extract adds natural shine and luster. Suitable for all hair in need of some TLC, it's packed full of strengthening properties which provide nourishment, protection and boost shine so hair feels softer, more manageable and healthier.
how: Apply to damp or towel dried hair. Massage from root to tip. Leave to dry naturally or style as desired

name: Maxi.Wash
info: A deep cleansing shampoo to strip unwanted product residue and excess oil that can build up in your hair. Tropical fruit acids (AHA) and anti pollution agents deeply cleanse the hair. Sage extracts dissolve the fats and oils. A herbal blend of lime, mint and eucalyptus remove excess oil and stimulate sluggish and sensitive scalps.
how: Apply to wet hair. Massage into hair and scalp, but do not scrub your scalp. Rinse and repeat

name: Powder Puff Volumising Powder
info: To give yourself the bedroom look, you can just sprinkle a few taps of POWDER.PUFF onto the roots of your hair and ‘hey presto’ you have the bedroom look when you need it. POWDER.PUFF is also great for short hair. To create a messy casual volume, gently tap a few shakes on the hair, concentrating on the roots, gently rub with your finger tips to create oomph! The powder morphs into a weightless matte product that holds and promotes body.
how: Shake bottle before use. Sprinkle a small amount onto damp or dry hair concentrating on the roots. Work into the roots and style as desired

name: Repair Me Wash
info: This reconstructing shampoo is ideal for removing impurities and replenishing fine, dry and brittle hair types. With a powerful blend that is rich in proteins, including bamboo and silk amino acids, it strengthens each strand to make the hair appear fuller, healthier and stronger.
how: Massage in wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with Kevin Murphy REPAIR.ME.RINSE. For best results it is recommended that you use REPAIR ME WASH & RINSE on two consecutive washes, then use RE.STORE on the third wash

name: Repair Me Rinse
info: This reconstructing shampoo is ideal for removing impurities and replenishing fine, dry and brittle hair types. With a powerful blend that is rich in proteins, including bamboo and silk amino acids, it strengthens each strand to make the hair appear fuller, healthier and stronger.
how: Massage in wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with Kevin Murphy REPAIR.ME.RINSE. For best results it is recommended that you use REPAIR ME WASH & RINSE on two consecutive washes, then use RE.STORE on the third wash

name: Re.Store
info: This reconstructing shampoo is ideal for removing impurities and replenishing fine, dry and brittle hair types. With a powerful blend that is rich in proteins, including bamboo and silk amino acids, it strengthens each strand to make the hair appear fuller, healthier and stronger.
how: Massage in wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with Kevin Murphy REPAIR.ME.RINSE. For best results it is recommended that you use REPAIR ME WASH & RINSE on two consecutive washes, then use RE.STORE on the third wash

name: Smooth Again Wash
info: A smoothing and nourishing conditioner for coarse, thick hair. Enriched with keratin protein that mimics the structure of natural proteins in the hair and cocoa butter that acts as a natural layer of protection to seal and refine split ends reducing the appearance of frizz. Perfect for smoothing and nourishing unmanageable and frizzy hair types, with consistent use, hair feels softer, looks healthier and is easier to style.
how: Apply to hair after using Kevin Murphy SMOOTH.AGAIN.WASH. Distribute evenly through the hair. Leave on for 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For best results, follow with Kevin Murphy SMOOTH.AGAIN

name: Smooth Again Rinse
info: A smoothing and nourishing conditioner for coarse, thick hair. Enriched with keratin protein that mimics the structure of natural proteins in the hair and cocoa butter that acts as a natural layer of protection to seal and refine split ends reducing the appearance of frizz. Perfect for smoothing and nourishing unmanageable and frizzy hair types, with consistent use, hair feels softer, looks healthier and is easier to style.
how: Apply to hair after using Kevin Murphy SMOOTH.AGAIN.WASH (available on our platform). Distribute evenly through the hair. Leave on for 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For best results, follow with Kevin Murphy SMOOTH.AGAIN (available in our platform)
important: Contains nut oil.

name: Stimulate-Me.Rinse
info: A refreshing daily conditioner for men. Formulated with stimulating camphor crystals, bergamot mint and black pepper, it soothes the scalp and restores lack-luster hair.
how: For best results use Kevin Murphy STIMULATE.ME.WASH first (available on our platform). Apply to clean hair, distribute through lengths and ends. Leave on for 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly

name: Stimulate-Me.Wash
info: An antioxidant rich shampoo designed to refresh and clarify the hair. With a repairing and invigorating blend of camphor crystals, bergamot mint and black pepper it helps to stimulate the scalp and rejuvenate whilst removing product build up from over-styling.
how: Apply to damp hair. Massage into scalp, lengths and ends. Rinse and repeat. For best results, follow with Kevin Murphy STIMULATE.ME.RINSE (available on our platform)

name: Thick Again Treatment Lotion
info: A leave-in thickening treatment designed for men with fine or thinning hair. With a reconstructing blend of citrus favonoids, ginger root nettle, parsley extracts and oleanic acid, it helps to prevent hair loss and promote fuller, stronger and healthier hair.
how: For best results, use Kevin Murphy STIMULATE.ME.WASH and Kevin Murphy STIMULATE.ME.RINSE before (both available on our platform). Shake bottle well. Spray evenly through damp or towel dried hair. Concentrate on the roots and scalp. Do not rinse, style as usual

name: Brazilian Joia Strengthening & Smoothing Conditioner
info: A creamy-rich, yet weightless conditioner for silky, touchably-soft hair. Their patented SOL Seal Technology™ with plant-based keratin and hair-healthy Brazilian Beauty Blend is clinically proven to smooth and repair hair. Wrap your strands with a hug + treat action to fuse together split ends, reduce breakage and help prevent future damage.

name: Brazilian Joia Strengthening & Smoothing Shampoo
info: A highly lathering, sulfate-free shampoo cleanses gently without ever stripping. info: Bum Bum Body Scrub is perfect for areas that need extra attention: elbows, knees, shins, and feet. You can even massage right in between your toes while soaking in your bath for an extra treat and spa-like results at home.

name: Coco Cabana Cream
info: The Coco Cabana Cream is better than ever – creamy-smooth to absorb deliciously into skin and with an irresistible light, luscious texture glides on and kisses the body with plush, pampering oils that melt into skin and linger for soft, dewy, touchable skin. Benefits are heightened with the Brazilian Beauty Blend of antioxidant-rich açaí and nourishing cupuaçu butter.

name: Bum Bum Cream
info: Pronounced “boom boom” in Brazil, the bum bum is a nation-wide obsession. It's ALL about body joy and taking care of yourselves head-to-toe, which is why Brazil has the smallest bikinis and best-fitting jeans. And beautiful bum bums have a secret—a cream, created with caffeine-rich Guaraná. Helps visibly smooth and tighten the appearance of your skin thanks to potent, caffeine-rich Guaraná Extract. Fast-absorbing Cupuaçu Butter delivers deep hydration and essential fatty-acids deep into the skin, making this incredibly hydrating cream and instant treat to leave your skin feeling silky soft. Antioxidant-packed ingredients like Guaraná Extract and Açaí Oil help prevent environmental damage on your skin. Infused with Brazil Nut Oil, the most selenium-rich food in the world, to help support the skin's natural ability to protect itself while giving it the glow of healthy-looking skin. Addictively scented with the Cheirosa '62 fragrance with delicious notes of pistachio, salted caramel and vanilla, apply this body cream all over and you’ll feel body-confidence wherever you go, from day to night and well beyond.

name: Coco Cabana body cleanser
info: This creamy cleanser is so lathery-rich with soothing ingredients, it easily doubles as the perfect shaving cream and is perfect for dry skin. And who wouldn’t want silky-smooth, legs with the most amazing coconut scent? Brazilian Babe skin starts in the shower with this creamy-soft and super hydrating cleanser. A luxurious, sulfate-free lather is enriched with our CocoSugar Blend of nourishing coconut oil and fermented sugar to draw delicious moisture to your skin. Ultimate shower treat hugs your body with soothing ingredients for comfy, clean, bouncy skin. In our mouthwatering scent of Cheirosa ’39 fragrance (Coco Cabana Cream) with notes of young, green coconut, tropical orchid, and toasted praline.

name: Rio Sunset Glow Oil
info: In Brazil, glowing skin is a year-round obsession, and one of the biggest Brazilian Beauty Secrets. These obsession-worthy glow oils are all about highlighting your best assets and putting your body in the best light. Luscious. Beaming. Gorgeous. A Rio sunset glow dances on your body to catch the perfect light. Enticing and lusciously inviting. For Body: Pump away for body. Pump more as you go for more glow. Blend all over for smooth, even application. For Face: One tiny pump is more than enough. Mix in with your foundation, or use alone as a liquid illuminator.
src: ./images/products/SOL DE JANEIRO Rio Sunset Glow Oil.jpg

name: Sol Oil SPF +30
info: In Brazil, they love the sun and they worship their skin. Nobody treats their skin better, pampers their bodies more, and feels Body Joy and Body Love more than they do in Brazil. That's why they developed the Bum Bum Sol Oil SPF 30. An infusion of nourishing skin-smoothers like Cupuaçu Butter and Coconut Oil hydrate and soften, for touchable skin that feels and looks amazingly healthy. Body-luscious luminizers give you an instantly gorgeous glow - perfect for flaunting. Broad-spectrum SPF body oil protects your skin from damage done by the sun’s UVA and UVB rays, while potent antioxidants protect your skin from other environmental aggressors. Sol de Janeiro cares about the planet. They never use coral-damaging ingredients in the SPF products.

name: Blonde Perfecting Purple Shampoo
info: Banish brassiness in blonde, lightened (including brunette), and even grey hair with this purple shampoo, featuring deep violet pigments to counteract unwanted yellow and orange tones. The gentle cleansing, tone-correcting formula is specially designed to maintain cool tones in between salon appointments while enhancing color depth and dimension. ArganID™ technology helps repair hair from the inside out while sealing the cuticle to impart brilliant shine. Color-safe.
how: Massage through wet hair and scalp. Leave on for 3–5 minutes. Rinse well. Follow with your favorite Moroccanoil Conditioner.

name: Moisture Repair Conditioner
info: Restore damaged hair caused by colour, chemical processing or heat styling. Moroccanoil® Moisture Repair Conditioner gently and effectively detangles and conditions the hair to leave it hydrated, manageable and strong. Its highly concentrated, reparative formula restores hair's health, moisture and elasticity with antioxidant-rich argan oil, reconstructive keratin and fatty acids. colour-safe.
how: After shampooing, squeeze excess water and apply Moroccanoil® Moisture Repair Conditioner from mid-length to ends. Leave on for 1–2 minutes and rinse well. Use regularly with Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Shampoo for best results (available on our platform).

name: Color Continue Conditioner
info: Extend the life of your colour-treated hair with Moroccanoil's Colour Continue Conditioner, enriched with a nourishing formula that helps to rebuild the keratin structure and lock in dye using the brand's Colorlink technology. Repairing and hydrating each strand on both physical and chemical levels, the addition of argan oil retains hair's integrity, while delivering a salon-fresh look every time.

name: Curl Defining Cream
info: Easily activate and define curls while hydrating hair. Moroccanoil® Curl Defining Cream is one of the most popular products for curly hair. This argan oil-infused curl definer features an advanced heat-activated technology that provides a curl memory factor to fight frizz and create well-defined, natural-looking, bouncy curls that last.

name: Dry Body Oil
info: Instant moisture that achieves soft, silky results, Moroccanoil Body™ Dry Body Oil Fragrance Originale infuses skin with the antioxidant-rich, nourishing properties of argan oil rich in essential fatty acids, as well as olive and avocado oils. The weightless formula absorbs quickly to lock in moisture, while soothing dry areas and improving overall skin texture and tone. Delicately fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, Fragrance Originale.
how: Spray a thin layer of Moroccanoil® Dry Body Oil directly onto skin immediately after showering and lightly massage in an upward circular motion. Repeat as desired.

name: Hydrating Conditioner
info: Condition and detangle dehydrated hair with Moroccanoil® Hydrating Conditioner. This gentle, daily-use formula leaves hair smoother, more manageable and easier to style. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, Vitamins A and E and moisture-attracting red algae for optimal hydration for all hair types--from normal to dry hair. colour-safe.
how: After shampooing, squeeze excess water and apply Moroccanoil® Hydrating Conditioner from mid-length to ends. Leave on for 1–2 minutes and rinse well. Use regularly for best results.

name: Hydrating Shampoo
info: Infuse dehydrated, dry hair with much-needed moisture. Moroccanoil® Hydrating Shampoo conditions hair with antioxidant-rich argan oil, Vitamins A and E and moisture-attracting red algae—for hair that looks and feels healthier. This moisturizing shampoo is gentle enough for daily use and provides optimal hydration for both normal and colour-treated hair. Increase your hair's manageability, smoothness and shine. colour-safe.
how: Massage Moroccanoil® Hydrating Shampoo throughout wet hair and scalp. Continue to add water to activate a rich lather from the highly concentrated formula. Rinse thoroughly until water runs clear. Repeat if needed, and follow with Moroccanoil Hydrating Conditioner (available on our platform).

name: Moisture Repair Shampoo
info: Repair damaged hair caused by colour, chemical processing or heat styling. Moroccanoil® Moisture Repair Shampoo gently and effectively cleanses and revives hair to leave it nourished, manageable and strong. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, reconstructive keratin and fatty acids, this moisturizing shampoo mends broken strands and dead ends to restore elasticity, moisture and shine. colour-safe.
how: Massage Moroccanoil® Moisture Repair Shampoo throughout wet hair and scalp. Continue to add water to activate a rich lather from the highly concentrated formula. Rinse thoroughly until water runs clear. Repeat if needed, and follow with Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Conditioner.

name: Hydrating Mask Light
info: Revive lifeless, dry hair with this moisturizing, five-minute hair mask. Moroccanoil® Hydrating Mask Light is a rich and creamy, yet lightweight, deep-conditioning treatment that's rich in argan oil and nourishing ingredients. This high-performance formula hydrates and conditions fine hair while dramatically improving its texture, elasticity, shine and manageability.
how: Apply a generous amount of Moroccanoil® Hydrating Mask Light to towel-dried hair and comb through. Leave on for 5–7 minutes and rinse thoroughly. No heat required. Use 1–2 times weekly. TIP: For deeper conditioning, mix a few drops of Moroccanoil Treatment in with this hair mask.

name: Intense Hydrating Mask
info: Treat yourself to a quick, reviving five-minute hair mask. Moroccanoil® Intense Hydrating Mask is a high-performance, rich and creamy deep conditioner formulated for medium to thick, dry hair. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil and nourishing ingredients, it hydrates and conditions while dramatically improving hair's texture, elasticity, shine and manageability.
how: Apply a generous amount of Moroccanoil® Intense Hydrating Mask to towel-dried hair and comb through. Leave on for 5–7 minutes and rinse thoroughly. No heat required. Use 1–2 times weekly. TIP: For deeper conditioning, mix in a few drops of Moroccanoil Treatment when using this hair mask.

name: Restorative Hair Mask
info: For damaged hair in need of instant repair, Moroccanoil® Restorative Hair Mask is a 5–7-minute revitalizing treatment that reconstructs hair and infuses protein back into strands that have been damaged by chemical treatments or heat styling. Its high-performance, deeply restorative formula is rich in argan oil, shea butter and reparative proteins that restore hair's elasticity and rebuild its strength from the inside out.
how: After shampooing, apply a generous amount of Moroccanoil® Restorative Hair Mask to towel-dried hair and comb through. Let product absorb for 5–7 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. This mask is highly reparative to the internal structure of the hair and should be sealed in afterward with a conditioner. Use once a week and less frequently as hair’s health improves. Here’s a hair tip for thick, coarse hair: Combine approximately 1 teaspoon of Moroccanoil® Treatment for added shine and elasticity.

name: Treatment Light
info: Enjoy healthy, silky, shiny hair that's full of life. Moroccanoil® Treatment Light is specifically formulated for the delicate needs of light-coloured (including platinum and white) and fine hair. The original foundation for hairstyling, Moroccanoil Treatment Light can be used as a conditioning, styling and finishing tool all in one. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil and shine-boosting vitamins, this nourishing treatment detangles, speeds up drying time and boosts shine—leaving hair smooth and more manageable than ever before. Outshine the rest.
how: Apply 1–2 pumps of Moroccanoil® Treatment Light to clean, towel-dried hair, from mid-length to ends. Blow-dry or let dry naturally. Apply on dry hair to tame flyaways, condition split ends and add shine. TIP: Mix a few drops of Moroccanoil Treatment Light with Moroccanoil Intense Hydrating Mask, Weightless Hydrating Mask or Restorative Hair Mask for extra smooth hair.

Unlike conventional sheet masks made with cotton, the 'nude seal' technology used in this collection features an ultra-thin skin-fitting material that comfortably clings to all facial contours for effective delivery of the concentrated serum. name: Body Creme
info: Deeply nourish and restore parched skin with our luxurious whipped Body Crème. Made with powerful antioxidizing and moisturizing squalane, cupuaçu butter, and coconut oil, it’ll soak in quick with skincredible results.
how: Massage onto skin while it's still damp after a bath or shower. Apply all over the body, focusing on drier areas like knees and elbows (but skip the face). Let it melt in for a smooth, velvety finish!

name: Detox Shampoo
info: Been on a dry shampoo binge? This concentrated shampoo with apple cider vinegar will deeply cleanse away dirt, oil, and impurities. It also removes buildup from styling products and hard water deposits. Leaves hair feeling refreshed and super clean. Here’s your fresh start, see you next week.
how: Thoroughly wet hair from roots to ends, then squeeze out excess water. Lather a quarter-size amount in hands, then part hair using fingers and apply as close to the scalp as possible. Let sit for 1 to 3 minutes, then rinse!

name: Fine Hair Conditioner Refill
info: This lightweight conditioner for fine hair is infused with keratin, biotin, and chia seed oil to strengthen and volumize so you and your hair can start living a fuller life. Pair with Fine Shampoo for best results.
how: After Fine Shampoo, apply a quarter-size amount to hair, focusing on mid-shaft and ends. Comb through with fingers. Rinse clean with cold water to lock in shine.

name: Fine Hair Conditioner
info: This lightweight conditioner for fine hair is infused with keratin, biotin, and chia seed oil to strengthen and volumize so you and your hair can start living a fuller life. Pair with Fine Shampoo for best results.
how: After Fine Shampoo, apply a quarter-size amount to hair, focusing on mid-shaft and ends. Comb through with fingers. Rinse clean with cold water to lock in shine.

name: Fine Hair Shampoo
info: This color-safe shampoo breathes life into fine, flat hair with strengthening keratin, biotin, and nourishing chia seed oil. Hair is left clean, bouncy, and full of volume, so you can finally be fine with being fine. Follow with Fine Conditioner for best results.
how: Thoroughly wet hair from roots to ends. Lather a quarter-size amount in your hands, then work into roots and anywhere hair touches the scalp. Rinse shampoo. Make sure to squeeze out excess moisture before pairing with Fine Conditioner.

name: Hair Oil
info: Seal split ends and smooth frizz with Ouai Hair Oil, an award-winning hair oil that protects hair from heat damage and colour fading while providing an ultra-smooth, high-gloss finish. One to three drops is all it takes for this hair oil to work its magic. Formulated with African galanga, argan, ama and Asian borage oils, this floral scented hair oil is useful for both dry and damp hair.
how: Work 1 - 3 drops through wet hair and air dry. Or, smooth through dry strands after a blowout to calm frizz. This amazing oil doubles as a hydrating overnight hair mask. Work it in, catch some Z's and rinse in the morning.

name: Matte Pomade
info: A mid-weight, medium-control finishing paste that is easily distributed through hair for moldable texture, shape, and separation with a matte finish. Great for short styles, taming unruly ends or flyaways in a sleek look, or to add  texture to longer hair for that effortlessly cool look.
how: Work a dime-sized dab through the ends of hair for easy, piecey texture.

how: Thoroughly wet hair from roots to ends. Lather a quarter-size amount in your hands, then work into roots and anywhere hair touches the scalp. Rinse shampoo. Make sure to squeeze out excess moisture before pairing with Medium Conditioner.

how: After Thick Shampoo, apply a quarter-size amount to hair, focusing on mid-shaft and ends. Comb through with fingers. Rinse clean with cold water to lock in shine.
