name: Scalp and Body Scrub
info: This deep-cleansing, foaming scrub gives a fresh start to your scalp and skin. A weekly treatment powered by gently exfoliating sugar crystals to scrub-a-OUAI buildup and soften skin, and a dose of probiotics to leave your body's biome balanced and happy.
how: SCALP: In the shower, section wet hair and apply a quarter-size amount directly to the scalp. Rub in circular motions to activate lather, then rinse and follow with your favorite OUAI conditioner. BODY: Apply to damp skin and rub in circular motions to gently exfoliate.

name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum
info: Formulated with pro-vitamin B5 and pineapple ceramide, B-Hydra™ delivers steady hydration throughout the day, leaving the skin looking healthy and more illuminated. Blended with a unique lentil-apple-watermelon complex, B-Hydra™ helps diminish drabness, dryness, and the appearance of fine lines. Your complexion will appear brighter and more youthful upon every application. This lightweight, hard-hitting serum is ideal for all skin.
src: ./images/products/BHydra Intensive Hydration Serum by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser by Drunk Elephant
info: With a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollients, this gentle formula rinses away without an ounce of residue, leaving skin clean and soft.

name: C-Firma Day Serum
info: This revolutionary vitamin C serum is jam packed with a powerful antioxidant complex of l-ascorbic and ferulic acids to reveal a brighter, firmer, and more even-looking complexion. Potently formulated with pumpkin ferment extract and sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, C-Firma™ helps to enzymatically dissolve surface dead skin cells as it intensely hydrates. The result is a noticeably diminished appearance of photodamage and aging, replaced by incredible radiance and luminosity.
important: C-Firma™ contains pure L-ascorbic acid and is best when fresh, so USE IMMEDIATELY and DON’T STOCK UP!

name: C-Tango Multivitamin Eye Cream
info: C-Tango™ is a dance of potent antioxidants, replenishing ceramides and plant oils, and soothing actives, all designed to refresh skin and restore a radiant appearance. Gentle enough for a.m. and p.m. use and powerful enough to improve even stubborn signs of damage.
src: ./images/products/C-Tango Multivitamin Eye Cream by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Cocomino Glossing Shampoo
info: Soothing and strengthening amino acids and extracts help prevent water loss and add smoothness and shine while acting as a heat protectant for hair. Antioxidant-and fatty acid-rich oils such as sacha inchi seed, along with marula and argan, add moisture without weighing hair down. A multi-amino-acid blend adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce. Panthenol and sodium PCA help boost water content and prevent dehydration. Cocomino™ Glossing Shampoo has a pH of 5.5.

name: Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner
info: Formulated with an advanced blend of amino acids and smoothing, hydrating agents, Cocomino™ fights frizz and static while adding shine. Marula butter and a nourishing mix of oils (including argan, mongongo, baobab, tamanu and kalahari seed) leave hair soft—never greasy or weighed down. The multi-amino-acid blend adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce.
src: ./images/products/Cocomino Marula Cream Conditioner by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: E-Rase Milki Micellar Water
info: Made with ultra-mild micelles, soothing vitamin E, replenishing fatty acids, and antioxidant-rich, nonfragrant plant oils (marula, baobab, mongongo, wild melon seed, ximenia seed, passionfruit, and sweet almond), E-Rase™ nourishes skin while dissolving and lifting away makeup and dirt, is barrier-supportive, and may be used anytime you need a quick skin refreshment.
src: ./images/products/E-Rase Milki Micellar Water by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: F-Balm Electrolyte Waterfacial Hydrating Mask
info: With a blend of barrier-replenishing ingredients, including niacinamide, sodium PCA, plant squalane, five forms of ceramides, omega fatty acids, and powerful antioxidants, F-Balm™ effectively rehydrates hungover, overly-parched skin, making it soft and supple. Tiny beads loaded with vitamin F burst during application to deliver extra emollience and soothing hydration.
src: ./images/products/F-Balm Electrolyte Waterfacial Hydrating Mask by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Kamili Cream Body Cleanser
info: Infused with luxe, fatty-acid-rich marula, sweet almond, sacha inchi seed, and maracuja oils, plus a multi-amino-acid blend, Kamili™ calms while rinsing dirt and other substances away—without stripping or disrupting the delicate skin barrier. Kamili™ has a pH of 5.0 and is appropriate for all skin, even the most sensitive.
src: ./images/products/Kamili Cream Body Cleanser by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: D-Bronzi Antipollution Drops
info: D-Bronzi’s just-got-back-from somewhere-sunny glow flatters every complexion. It’s an easy way to get a bronzy glow without the long-term consequences.

name: Lala Retro Whipped Cream
info: This multifaceted rescue cream, infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex, provides replenishing barrier support by reinforcing skin’s acid mantle and defending against the effects of everyday stressors. Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer easily soaks in to release intense hydration. In addition, antioxidant-rich fermented green tea helps combat signs of aging. Loaded with omega acids, Lala helps skin retain long-lasting moisture, forming a protective layer that allows skin to function at its optimal level.
src: ./images/products/Lala Retro Whipped Cream by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Protini Polypeptide Cream
info: Protini’s proprietary formula restores younger, revived-looking skin, almost from the first application. Lines, wrinkles, and signs of sun damage appear reduced, and skin feels strengthened and moisturized.

name: Shaba Complex Eye Serum
info: The Shaba Complex™ Eye Serum contains potent doses of black tea ferment and copper peptides that work together to support a smoother, younger appearance around the eyes, helping to slow down the signs of aging before they appear. With a unique combination of edelweiss stem cells and niacinamide, Shaba Complex™ helps diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The powerful antioxidants in Co-Q10 help prevent premature signs of aging from environmental aggressors, while also helping to fade age spots.
src: ./images/products/Shaba Complex Eye Serum by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Sili Body Lotion
info: With a blend of nourishing plant oils and butters, squalane, strengthening amino acids, a reparative 5-ceramide blend and barrier-supportive sodium PCA, Sili™ locks in hydration while restoring the moisture you’ve lost due to damaging environmental stressors.

name: Slaai Makeup Melting Butter Cleanser
info: Formulated with antioxidant-rich fruit extracts and oils to help soothe, plus a nourishing African oil blend of marula, baobob, kalahari melon, mongongo and ximenia, Slaai™ Makeup-Melting Butter Cleanser cleanses and moisturizes without any irritants or sensitizers.
src: ./images/products/Slaai Makeup Melting Butter Cleanser by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Night Serum
info: Formulated with the dream team of glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids and blended with raspberry extract and horse chestnut, T.L.C. Framboos™ curbs excess oiliness as it reveals greater clarity and luminosity. It also enhances the performance of other products by clearing the way for maximum absorption. T.L.C. Framboos™ sinks in easily and delivers an effective level of chemical exfoliation without harsh side effects, like dryness or sensitization. Go from a drab complexion to an absolutely luminous one, practically overnight.
src: ./images/products/T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Night Serum by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub
info: Using a blend of six antioxidant- and fatty-acid-rich plant oils (including marula, mongongo, baobab and maracuja) and a quick-absorbing multi-amino-acid blend,  T.L.C. Happi Scalp™ Scrub keeps the scalp nourished, flake-free, and balanced.
src: ./images/products/T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF30
info: Umbra Sheer™ is a daily sunscreen loaded with potent antioxidants, like astaxanthin, grape juice, and sunflower shoot extract, to minimize the appearance of photoaging for a more youthful-looking complexion. Infused with raspberry seed and marula oils, Umbra Sheer™ delivers essential moisture and minimizes the look of fine lines and wrinkles for skin that appears healthy and preserved. This unique formulation is ideal for daily use without any white residue or greasiness. Umbra Sheer™ is suitable for all skin, including the most sensitive.
src: ./images/products/Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF30 by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil
info: Straight from the pip of the marula fruit, the pure, unrefined oil is virtually untouched by any chemical or fragrance, natural or synthetic. This super-absorbable oil will quickly sink in and diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Appropriate for all skin, including the most sensitive.
src: ./images/products/Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: Wild Marula Tangle Spray
info: Nourishing plant oils—including sacha inchi seed, pracaxi seed, marula and argan—condition while penetrating the hair shaft to strengthen it against the high temperatures of hair straighteners and dryers. The multi-amino-acid blend adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce. Added to damp hair and before heat styling (or air drying), Wild Marula™ Tangle Spray leaves hair feeling healthier— never sticky, greasy or heavy. Wild Marula™ Tangle Spray has a pH of 4.5.
src: ./images/products/Wild Marula Tangle Spray by Drunk Elephant.jpg

name: SupaBalm Rose
info: KNC Beauty’s SupaBalm promises to keep dehydrated lips kissably soft at home and on the go thanks to its tube that's perfectly sized for handbags. The creamy, tintless finish means it can double as a moisturising base with your favourite make-up products, while the cruelty-free, vegan and paraben-free formulation will give you plenty to smile about.

name: Huile De Leonor Greyl
info: Hair is fragile and just like a silk blouse, or cashmere sweater, needs consideration and gentle treatment to prolong its life and vitality. Leonor Greyl’s L'Huile de Leonor Greyls helps prepare hair for washing; nurturing and hydrating, to preserve hair health and longevity by protecting against the drying effects of hard water, whilst reducing the risk of breakage by unraveling knots and tangles. Recent independent research has shown that hair can absorb around 15% of its weight in coconut oil in an hour. An overnight soaking oil (six hours) increases absorption to around 20% or 25% - it is one of the few ingredients to penetrate the hair cortex. The result of forty years experience at the forefront of the hair care industry, all Leonor Greyl products are developed using only the finest botanical ingredients, to treat, maintain and protect both hair and scalp and grant you glamorous, lustrous locks.

name: The Lip Mask
info: Nourish the lips with KNC Beauty’s lip mask and reap the benefits of plump and juicy fullness. The label formulates this hydrating mask as a playful and pouty sheet design to be placed delicately over the mouth, infusing the lips with natural collagen to stimulate regeneration and leaving them enriched with intense moisture.

name: SupaBalm Mint
info: KNC Beauty’s SupaBalm promises to keep dehydrated lips kissably soft at home and on the go thanks to its tube that's perfectly sized for handbags. The creamy, tintless finish means it can double as a moisturising base with your favourite make-up products, while the cruelty-free, vegan and paraben-free formulation will give you plenty to smile about.

name: Lip Scrub Set
info: ndulge in KNC Beauty’s Lip Scrub set – it's made for exfoliating, priming and prepping your pout. Enriched with creamy shea butter, sunflower oil and moringa oil, the cruelty-free formula offers hydrating and antioxidant properties, while the scrubbing tool gently smooths lips.

name: Lip Mask
info: Nourish the lips with KNC Beauty’s lip mask and reap the benefits of plump and juicy fullness. The label formulates this hydrating mask as a playful and pouty sheet design to be placed delicately over the mouth, infusing the lips with natural collagen to stimulate regeneration and leave them enriched with intense moisture.

name: Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask
info: Nourish the hair with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Avocado + Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask, a hydrating hair mask packed with potent ingredients that work to revitalise dry hair and help to leave it looking soft, shiny and smooth. Fortified with phytonutrients inspired by green smoothie ingredients, this deep conditioning formula contains spinach, spirulina and chia seeds to help lock in moisture, while kiwi extract provides a boost of vitamin C and antioxidants to protect hair from environmental aggressors, encouraging stronger, healthier hair. The addition of nourishing avocado oil and cocoa seed butter work to detangle and restore dry hair without weighing it down, making this ideal for all hair types.
how: Apply a few drops to dry or damo hair, focusing on mid-length to ends or other areas of damage.
src: ./images/products/Avocado Kiwi Mega Moisture Superfood Mask by Briogeo.jpg

name: Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner
info: Give hair the nourishment it deserves with the nectar of banana and coconut thanks to Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner, a creamy haircare treatment that helps to reinvigorate dull-looking hair. Designed to be used every day, Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner is inspired by nutrient-rich smoothies and enriched with a blend of nourishing antioxidants. Formulated using 97% naturally derived ingredients and specifically developed for dull, dry and lifeless-looking hair, this vegan-friendly conditioner helps to deliver a healthy boost to locks. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Banana + Coconut Nourishing Superfood Conditioner leaves hair softer, stronger and shinier.
how: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.

name: Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner
info: Create a new haircare and wellness routine with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner, a nourishing conditioner inspired by the juice wellness movement and supported by the powers of fruit acids and minerals. Mimicking the consistency of a rich fruit smoothie, this conditioner is infused with kale and apple extract as well as a range of vitamins, fruit and vegetable fatty acids and minerals. It has been formulated to replenish dull and lifeless locks, working in tandem with the Matcha and Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo for hair that dazzles. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Kale + Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner helps to support the natural vibrancy and strength of hair, hydrating every strand from root to tip and promoting healthy regrowth.
how: After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair from root to tip. Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing.
src: ./images/products/Kale Apple Replenishing Superfood Conditioner by Briogeo.jpg

name: Matcha + Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo
info: Unleash the inviting scent of apples with Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Matcha and Apple Replenishing Shampoo, a deliciously rich and nutritious shampoo inspired by supercharged apple smoothies. Enriched with fruit and vegetable fatty acids, this shampoo is ideal for dry and dull locks. It works to visibly replenish the hair’s natural shine and vitality and helps ensure that nutrients are absorbed from root to tip. Vitamins and minerals penetrate every strand, supporting strength and nourishment without removing natural moisture. Briogeo Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Matcha and Apple Replenishing Shampoo is free from SLS and won’t accelerate colour fade. It is suitable for use on coloured and chemically treated locks.
how: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage for 30 seconds as the lather builds, then rinse.
src: ./images/products/Matcha Apple Replenishing Superfood Shampoo by Briogeo.jpg

name: Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Conditioner
info: Enhance hair’s volume with Briogeo Blossom and Bloom™ Ginseng and Biotin Volumizing Conditioner, a dual-action conditioner that contributes towards increased fullness and thickness in locks that are fine, limp or lifeless. This conditioner features a unique ingredient: maltodextrin, a natural sugar starch that works to coat strands to boost their appearance without leaving hair sticky or tangled. Ginseng and ginger stimulate blood flow to the scalp and promote healthier hair growth, while biotin strengthens follicles with repeated use. Briogeo Blossom and Bloom™ Ginseng and Biotin Volumizing Conditioner is 98% naturally derived, making it vegan friendly and cruelty-free. Free from phthalates, parabens, silicones, sulphates, DEA and artificial dyes, the conditioner supports long-term hair health.
src: ./images/products/Blossom & Bloo Ginseng Biotin Volumizing Conditioner by Briogeo.jpg

name: Deep Conditioning Hair Mask
info: Say ‘goodbye’ to dry, damaged and lifeless locks with the Briogeo Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask, a deeply nourishing and restorative hair masked infused with 98% natural ingredients and innovative haircare technology. This conditioning mask sets to work in minutes to restore the hair’s hydration levels and natural vitality. Banishing dry, brittle strands, it harnesses Briogeo’s unique NOVA Complex to deliver transformative nutrients where they’re needed most. B vitamins, rosehip and argan oils, collagen and algae extract ensure that tresses look shiny, sleek and radiant. The Briogeo Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask can help to reduce future breakages by up to 75% with repeated use. The mask is made without phthalates, parabens, silicones and artificial dyes and is certified cruelty-free and vegan friendly.
how: After shampooing, massage Don't Despair, Repair! into the hair, ensuring the conditioner is evenly applied. Leave in for 5-10 minutes before rinsing. For even deeper conditioning, cover the hair in a plastic cap to retain moisture while sitting under the dryer for 30 minutes, then rinse.

name: Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil
info: The Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Strengthening Treatment Oil fortifies hair with bioidentical lipids such as ceramides and essential fatty acids, to help restore and replenish for a smooth, silky finish. This lightweight oil is densely packed with hair-essential ingredients and a clinically-proven repair technology that works to reinforce hair cuticles and protect against future hair breakage.
how: After shampooing, massage into the hair from mid-length to ends. Leave in for 5 to 10 minutes before rinsing. Can be used once or twice per week in place or conditioner.

name: Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo
info: This unique dry shampoo is enriched with binchotan charcoal, which works to draw impurities away from the scalp, detoxify the hair follicles and normalise oil production. The presence of clay, biotin, tapioca and rice starches contributes towards reduced sebum at the hairs’ roots, which can extend the result of heat treatments such as blow-drying. Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo contains witch hazel extract, which helps to prevent excessive oiliness from returning. The dry shampoo provides a solution to oily hair rather than a temporary fix; locks receive a targeted burst of nutrients to encourage healthy growth and shine.
how: Combat the effects of an oily scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, a refreshing dry shampoo that cleanses locks for a healthier head of hair.

name: Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment
info: Target the symptoms of a dry, irritable scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment, a cooling and soothing hair treatment enriched with peppermint and spearmint oils, binchotan charcoal, aloe vera, witch hazel, biotin, sodium hyaluronate and tea tree oil. This unique treatment works to draw oil and impurities away from the scalp, removing buildup and stimulating healthy hair growth for locks that are strong and shiny. The refreshing formula helps to reduce itchiness and irritation while providing antiseptic properties to soothe inflammation. The scalp is left hydrated and balanced, enriched with nutrients from 98% naturally derived ingredients that nourish and condition.
how: Part the hair into sections, apply 1-2 drops to each partition and massage into the scalp. Do not rinse out. The treatment should be applied after washing and before styling. It can also be applied before bedtime as a pre-shampoo scalp treatment.
src: ./images/products/Scalp Revival Charcoal Tea Tree Scalp Treatment by Briogeo.jpg

name: Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-exfoliating Shampoo
info: Reduce obstructive product buildup for a soothed scalp with Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo, a nourishing shampoo that detoxifies and protects. Used to draw impurities away from the scalp and follicles, it contributes towards healthy hair growth. This shampoo is infused with binchotan charcoal, vegetable-derived micro-exfoliators, peppermint and spearmint oils, coconut oil, panthenol and tea tree oil. Massaged into wet hair, it works to remove dead skin cells and leftover product while reducing irritation and inflammation and preventing dryness and flakiness. The reduced is a balanced, healthy scalp and stronger locks. Briogeo Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo has enriching super vitamins and 98% naturally derived ingredients. It detoxifies and exfoliates the scalp without sulphates, parabens, phthalates or gluten and is certified cruelty-free.
how: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage into the scalp and through to the ends. Rinse and repeat, as necessary. Apply your favorite Briogeo conditioner or treatment post-shampoo.
src: ./images/products/Scalp Revival Charcoal Coconut Oil Micro-exfoliating Shampoo by Briogeo.jpg

name: Banish Stick
info: The fast-acting formula of Indie Lee’s Banish Stick allows you to treat breakouts on the go and get your skin back to looking its best. Packed with the powerful sebum-dissolving properties of caviar lime extract and salicylic acid, this small but mighty formula is further enriched with sophora japonica flower and burdock root extracts to nourish the skin as it works.

name: Clearing mask
info: Deep cleanse and nourish the complexion with this gentle yet effective treatment mask. Salicylic and Glycolic Acids work to exfoliate dead skin cells. Bentonite Clay and Colloidal Sulfur help to gently draw out impurities. Zinc Oxide, Chamomile and Red Seaweed extracts ensure skin is left reconditioned and hydrated.
how: Apply a thin layer to damp, clean skin, avoiding the immediate eye area and allow the mask 20 minutes to work its magic. Gently rinse with warm water. Use weekly for optimum results.

name: Overnight Banish Gel
info: Ready to come to your rescue ahead of photo-filled occasions, the Overnight Banish Gel from Indie Lee acts fast on imperfections to ensure that your skin looks as good as you feel. Its kaolin and bentonite clays draw out – or rather ‘banish’ – excess oils and impurities from the skin, while the jasmine and vitamin-rich noni extracts work to nourish the complexion for glowing, spotlight-ready results.

name: Purifying Face Wash
info: Need a detox? Remove makeup and impurities with this antioxidant-rich foaming cleanser. Java Plum, Orange and Lavender extracts nourish the skin while dissolving excess sebum. Clove, Burdock and Mandarin promote a clearer, brighter complexion. Rose Damascena and Jasmine ensure skin feels soft and supple, never tight.

name: Radiance Renewal Peel
info: Reveal a brighter, more even-toned complexion with this Vitamin C rich exfoliating blend of Java Plum and Banana extracts. Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) from Caviar Lime combine with Mango derived Beta-Carotene, Vitamin A and Glycerin to leave skin looking soft, supple and luminous.
how: To optimize radiance and tone, gently wipe over dry, freshly cleansed skin avoiding the delicate eye and lip areas. Follow with serum from Prevent step. Use daily or 2-3 times weekly for sensitive skin

name: Restorative eye cream
info: A powerhouse eye cream for immediate results. Ectoin, antioxidant Centella and Paracress extracts help strengthen, protect and diminish the visible signs of aging. Conditioning algae and Licorice Root promote brighter, plumper, more youthful-looking skin.

name: Squalane Facial Oil
info: Inspired by nature, clean beauty brand Indie Lee is firmly rooted in the founder’s ambition to educate and empower us in the world of natural yet high-performance skincare, putting safety and ethical choices at the forefront of every formula. Take the Squalane Facial Oil; infused with 100% olive-derived squalane, it plumps, nourishes and provides intense hydration, improving your complexion’s overall texture and tone.

name: Stem Cell Serum
info: The power of plant stem cells meets hardworking botanicals. Echinacea Stem Cells help improve the appearance of firmer skin while Alpine Rose provides antioxidant benefits to combat lackluster skin. Nourishing Bamboo extracts and Hyaluronic Acid leave skin hydrated and supple.
how: Apply to freshly cleansed skin, morning and evening. Use alone or layer under your favorite moisturizer for enhanced environmental protection.

name: No.0 Intensive Bond Building Treatment
info: A professional-inspired treatment that primes hair for deeper repair with the highest dose of patented OLAPLEX technology in any take-home product. It rebuilds hair bonds, strengthens and protects hair integrity. Use as the first step in a two-part system with N°.3 Hair Perfector.
important: N°.0 bottle should last 3-6 applications, based on hair length and density.

name: No 3 Hair Perfector
info: A professional-inspired treatment that primes hair for deeper repair with the highest dose of patented OLAPLEX technology in any take-home product. It rebuilds hair bonds, strengthens and protects hair integrity. Use as the first step in a two-part system with N°.3 Hair Perfector.
important: N°.0 bottle should last 3-6 applications, based on hair length and density.

name: No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo
info: N°4 Shampoo repairs and protects hair from everyday stresses — including damaged hair, split ends, and frizz — by re-linking broken bonds. Leaves hair easier to manage, shinier and healthier with each use. N°4 is color-safe and proven to reduce breakage and strengthen all types of hair.

name: No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner
info: Leaves hair easier to manage, shinier and healthier with each use. Protects and repairs damaged hair, split ends, and frizz by re-linking broken bonds. It is color-safe and will strengthen and leave your hair stronger than ever.

name: No.6 Bond Smoother
info: N°6 strengthens, moisturizes, and speeds up blow-dry times. Excellent for all hair types, including colored and chemically treated hair, and eliminates frizz and flyaways for up to 72 hours.

name: No.7 Bonding Oil
info: Dramatically increases shine, softness, and color vibrancy. N°7 minimizes flyaways and frizz, while providing UV/heat protection of up to 450°F/232°C.

name: Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo
info: Put this revolutionary (no, we're not being hyperbolic) dry shampoo to the spin class test and it will transform your sweaty, post-workout hair into bouncy, shiny perfection. This dry shampoo actually cleans hair, eliminating oil, sweat, and odor.
how: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 15-20 cm away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired.

name: Dry Shampoo Foam
info: It looks and feels like a mousse, but once dry, it acts like the best dry shampoo you've ever used for tackling seriously greasy roots.

name: Super Dry Shampoo
info: That time of the week again? Don’t let oily hair cramp your style. Our extra absorbent Super Dry Shampoo keeps you clean and volumized on the oiliest and flattest of hair days and has a fresh Melrose Place rose scent.

name: Dry Shampoo Darker tone
info: Your hair colour is personal, so your dry shampoo should be too. Introducing our first-ever dry shampoo in two formulas, for Dark Hair Tones and for Light Hair Tones. Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo Dark Tones contains ultra-fine, oil-absorbing rice starch that removes buildup and odor, leaving hair instantly clean and refreshed. Its UV-protecting, argan oil-infused formula breaks down instantly, leaving no dull residue and maintaining the natural richness of dark, brunette tones.
how: Shake well. Spray Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo 15–20 cm away from dry roots. Let dry, then massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo. Brush out.

name: Dry Shampoo Light Tones
info: Hair colour is personal. Dry shampoo should be too. By popular demand, Moroccanoil® launches its first-ever dry shampoo in two formulas, for Light Hair Tones and for Dark Hair Tones. Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo Light Tones contains ultra-fine rice starch that absorbs oil, buildup and odor, leaving hair instantly cleansed and refreshed. UV-protecting, argan oil-infused formula contains subtle violet undertones to balance brassiness in blonde hair and bring out the best in light tones.
how: Shake well. Spray Moroccanoil® Dry Shampoo 15–20 cm away from dry roots. Let dry, then massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo. Brush out.

name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
info: The Ordinary Niacinamide + Zinc is one of the brand’s best selling products. It helps to lighten dark spots and balance out any uneven skin tone. It is excellent for acne prone skin since it is oil free and won’t clog pores. The product contains 10% pure Niacinamide (vitamin B3) which reduces the appearance of skin blemishes. When combined with Zinc, the two ingredients work together to clear out pores and control oil production. The Ordinary Niacinamide + Zinc is recommended as one of the best The Ordinary products for acne scars with skin discolouration.
how: Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: If topical Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid and/or Ethylated L-Ascorbic Acid) is used as part of skincare, it should be applied at alternate times with this formula (ideally Vitamin C in the PM and this formula in the AM). Otherwise, Niacinamide can affect integrity of the Vitamin C.

name: Bain TS Shampooing balancing shampoo
info: 95% natural ingredients. Vegan. Purifies and cleanses scalp without irritating it. Eliminates excess sebum. Leaves hair soft, light and shiny. Hair Type: oily scalp.
how: Wet hair thoroughly. Emulsify shampoo between your palms. Apply to scalp and massage, adding small amounts of water progressively as a gentle lather builds. Rinse thoroughly.
important: If you prefer to wash your hair once a week, two successive applications are necessary to properly remove buildup from dust, pollution, dry shampoos or styling products. For maximum oil control, follow with Tonique Vegetale, a leave-in spray for oily scalp.
src: ./images/products/Bain TS Shampooing balancing shampoo for oily scalp 200ml.jpg

name: Masque Fleurs de Jasmin conditioning mask
info: 98,8 % natural ingredients. Hydrates and conditions hair without weighing it down. Leaves hair soft, supple, shiny and delicately scented. Hair type: thin and dry hair
how: As an everyday conditioner, apply on towel-dried length and ends, leave on for 2-5 minutes, comb through then rinse thoroughly. As a weekly intensive treatment, apply on dry length and ends, comb through and leave on 20 minutes before shampooing out. For easy detangling, add a small amount of product before passing a wide-tooth comb through the hair while rinsing.
important: For best results, apply L’Huile de Leonor Greyl to dry length and ends before shampooing.

name: Shampooing Au Miel Gentle volumizing shampoo
info: 96,6% natural ingredients. Creates volume, body and increases shine. Gentle formula perfect for everyday use
how: Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
important: Can be used as a “clarifying” shampoo to remove silicone buildup from styling products. If you prefer to wash your hair once a week, two successive applications are necessary to properly remove buildup from dust, pollution, dry shampoos or styling products. For added volume, follow with an alcohol-free volumizing styling mousse.

name: Shampooing Crème Moelle de Bambou
info: A potent treatment shampoo, Shampoo Creme Moelle de Bambou is crammed with intensive active ingredients, to restore long locks to their glossy, luminous best. Wheat derivatives, Carrot, silk proteins and Bamboo Marrow combine to repair traumatised hair fibres from the first application; regenerating the hair shaft, replenishing shine, restoring flexibility and renewing manageability. Suitable for all hair types but especially those with brittle lengths and ends, this luxurious shampoo simultaneously cleanses and conditions to save precious time, whilst improving the appearance and quality of your crowning glory.
how: After detangling, wet hair thoroughly; pour some shampoo into the palm of one hand and gently rub hands together to spread the product over the inside of both hands. Next, place your fingers on your scalp and massage gently in circular motions, lifting hair from time to time. Repeat the process by adding small amounts of water each time in order to obtain a good lather. If you shampoo daily, one application is sufficient, otherwise two are recommended.
